mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cinema(cinema_no, cinema_name, cinema_intro, cinema_totalScreen, cinema_phone, cinema_location) VALUES (cinema_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cinemaName}, #{cinemaIntro}, #{cinemaTotalScreen}, #{cinemaPhone}, #{cinemaLocation});
mapper.select: SELECT cinema_no, cinema_name, cinema_intro, cinema_totalScreen, cinema_phone, cinema_location FROM cinema WHERE cinema_no = #{cinemaNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE cinema SET cinema_name = #{cinemaName}, cinema_intro = #{cinemaIntro}, cinema_totalScreen = #{cinemaTotalScreen}, cinema_phone = #{cinemaPhone}, cinema_location = #{cinemaLocation} WHERE cinema_no = #{cinemaNo}
mapper.select: SELECT cinema_no, cinema_name, cinema_intro, cinema_totalScreen, cinema_phone, cinema_location FROM cinema WHERE cinema_no > 0 ORDER BY cinema_no DESC
